name: Dwarven Delve (itch)
description:
Nurem the dwarf has dug too greedily, and too deep. Now he is stuck spinning around his greatest foes for all eternity. Can you help him survive?

Dwarven Delve is a match-3 puzzle game where you control a character walking around the puzzle. The objective is to create matches of three or more enemies to earn a high score. You can move around all sides and push rows of enemies to create matches. Be careful, since pushing a row will put an enemy on the conveyor belt. Touching an enemy results in game over. 
You can destroy an enemy on the conveyor built by pushing a similar enemy from the puzzle into him. 
Picking up diamonds on the conveyor belt will increase your score.

Controls:
WASD to move
Space to switch conveyor belt direction
F to push the nearest row (if possible)
Escape to pause

Made for Ludum Dare 47 - theme 'Stuck in a loop'
